name: Construct the future
description: A sand falling game where you are free to do what ever you want. Shape the future the way you like it. The space bar will actually fill up the whole screen with random particles which might be a little relaxing to watch. The majority is controlled by mouse so it is kind of easy not going to lie ;-) Hope you have fun playing. The code for the project it available @NimComPoo-04 github.
